messages.default: OK, I will be back with all the holidays details for you in no time.
OK, let me check into the system. Thank you for your patience.
I'm sorry I didn't understand that. Why not ask me about our new HR Scheme and how it can benefit you?
Hi, my name is Simron. Nice to meet you! I'm a personal stylist available 24/7 to help you with anything you need - so feel free to ask me anything.
